thread.title: USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards
thread.title_full: USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards

author: GREG BEACHAM
title: USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards
text:
Richard Hartog USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards 
Southern California interim head coach Clay Helton conducts an NCAA college football practice in Los Angeles Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. The Trojans offensive coordinator, Helton is taking over for head coach Steve Sarkisian, who was fired Monday. (AP Photo/Richard Hartog) Richard Hartog USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards 
Southern California interim head coach Clay Helton conducts an NCAA college football practice in Los Angeles Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. The Trojans offensive coordinator, Helton is taking over for head coach Steve Sarkisian, who was fired Monday. (AP Photo/Richard Hartog) Richard Hartog USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards 
Southern California athletic director Pat Haden speaks with the media during a press conference after an NCAA college football practice in Los Angeles Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. He named the Trojans' offensive coordinator, Clay Helton, to take over for head coach Steve Sarkisian, whom Haden fired Monday. (AP Photo/Richard Hartog) Richard Hartog USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards 
Southern California athletic director Pat Haden speaks with the media during a press conference after an NCAA college football practice in Los Angeles Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. He named the Trojans' offensive coordinator, Clay Helton, to take over for head coach Steve Sarkisian, whom Haden fired Monday. (AP Photo/Richard Hartog) Richard Hartog USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards 
Southern California interim head coach Clay Helton speaks with the media during a press conference after an NCAA college football practice in Los Angeles Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. The Trojans offensive coordinator, Helton is taking over for head coach Steve Sarkisian, who was fired Monday. (AP Photo/Richard Hartog) Richard Hartog USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards 
Southern California interim head coach Clay Helton conducts an NCAA college football practice in Los Angeles Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. The Trojans offensive coordinator, Helton is taking over for head coach Steve Sarkisian, who was fired Monday. (AP Photo/Richard Hartog) Posted: Tuesday, October 13, 2015 6:12 pm | Updated: 7:01 pm, Tue Oct 13, 2015. USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards Associated Press | 0 comments 
LOS ANGELES (AP) — Southern California athletic director Pat Haden defended both his hiring and firing of Steve Sarkisian on Tuesday, saying the troubled football coach passed a thorough background check and had no behavioral missteps until the last two months. 
Haden said he sent a letter of termination to Sarkisian when he was unable to contact the coach personally, one day after Sarkisian showed up to work "unwell." Interim coach Clay Helton will lead the Trojans (3-2, 1-2 Pac-12) against No. 14 Notre Dame on Saturday. kAmQx H2D 23=6 E@ 82E96C 724ED 2?5 56E6C>:?6 E92E $E6G6VD 4@?5F4E 5:5 ?@E >66E &$r DE2?52C5D 2?5 6IA64E2E:@?D @7 2 9625 4@249[Q w256?
